subject: Football (College)
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: P. J. Williams, 21, a former Florida State defensive back who was cited after an automobile crash in October, was arrested again after a university police officer observed him having difficulty driving a sport utility vehicle.
snippet: P. J. Williams, 21, a former Florida State defensive back who was cited after an automobile crash in October, was arrested again after a university police officer observed him having difficulty driving a sport utility vehicle.
